Ghiscar (region)0727823uttk2x699t97er4bspw6xig2ojdbw1786292015-03-22T19:26:29ZThe Dragon Demands5014364/* References */[[Image:Ghiscar.png|right|thumb|200px|A map showing the location of Ghiscar on the continent of Essos.]]
'''Ghiscar''' is a region located on the continent of [[Essos]], south-east of [[Slaver's Bay]].<ref>[http://viewers-guide.hbo.com/game-of-thrones/season2/#!/locations/astapor/ HBO viewers guide, season 2 map, Astapor entry]</ref>
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Ghiscar is also located on the southeast of Slaver's Bay, south of the Ghiscari hills and the Worm River. South of Ghiscar are the Ghiscari Strait and some islands, including the large island Ghaen and a small island with the city of New Ghis.
